name: The Drifter's Reckoning (g2e Role)
description:
The Drifter's Reckoning is a Role and Pillar about running from your secret, violent past, and eventually facing it, for Galactic 2e. This game includes:

 The Drifter is a character role for Galactic 2e heavily inspired by Rurouni Kenshin, and a little by Kuill from The Mandalorian. This also takes some cues from World Champ Game Co’s Excommunicado. 

The Reckoning is a Pillar centered around that character’s past catching up with them.

---- 

Included: 

  • Layout version of the Drifter's Reckoning
  • Plain text version of the Drifter's Reckoning

----

This supplement was created as a last-minute addition to the Galactic 2e Jam, and hasn't really had a chance to be play tested or reviewed for content. If you have feedback on this game, please leave it below or send me a DM on Twitter.
